info.title: Appointments Manager API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the Appointments Manager application.

get.summary: Get all users and practitioners (Admin only)
get.description: Retrieve a list of all users and practitioners. Accessible only by admin and superadmin roles.

200.description: Successful retrieval of users and practitioners

message.example: No autorizado para realizar esta acción

post.description: Create a new practitioner in the system. Accessible only by admin and superadmin roles.

message.example: Profesional creado con éxito

post.description: Endpoint to create a new appointment for diagnosis or treatment.

message.example: Su cita ha sido reservada con éxito

error.example: Esta hora de visita no esta disponible
La cita solicitada se superpone con una cita existente.

post.description: Authenticate user and return an access token.

message.example: Login exitoso
Credenciales incorrectas

get.summary: Get Available Slots for Diagnosis (90-minute appointments)
get.description: Retrieve available time slots for Diagnosis appointments grouped by practitioner.

200.description: Successful retrieval of available diagnosis slots

practitioners.description: List of practitioners with their IDs, names, and diagnosis prices

available_slots_diagnose.description: Available diagnosis slots grouped by practitioner ID

get.summary: Get Available Slots for Treatment (60-minute appointments)
get.description: Retrieve available time slots for Treatment appointments grouped by practitioner.

200.description: Successful retrieval of available treatment slots

practitioners.description: List of practitioners with their IDs, names, and treatment prices

available_slots_treatment.description: Available treatment slots grouped by practitioner ID

get.summary: Get all appointments for the authenticated practitioner
get.description: Retrieve a list of all appointments for the logged-in practitioner. Admins can see all appointments.

post.description: Endpoint to create a new appointment for diagnosis or treatment.

message.example: Su cita ha sido reservada con éxito

error.example: Overlap detected for the requested appointment time
Esta hora de visita no esta disponible

delete.description: Endpoint to delete an existing appointment.

message.example: La reserva de visita ha sido eliminada con éxito
La reserva de visita indicada no existe

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific appointment

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the appointment to retrieve

message.example: Unauthorized
La reserva de visita indicada no existe

put.description: Endpoint to update patient data and/or kind of appointment for an existing appointment.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the appointment to update

message.example: La reserva de visita ha sido actualizada con éxito
La reserva de visita indicada no existe

error.example: Overlap detected for the requested appointment time

post.summary: Search appointments by date, time, and kind
post.description: Endpoint to search for appointments based on date, time, and kind of appointment for a specific practitioner.
Endpoint to search for appointments based on patient first and last name for a specific practitioner.

get.description: Retrieve available time slots for the authenticated practitioner.

practitioners.description: List of practitioners with their IDs and names

treatment_available_slots.description: Available treatment slots grouped by practitioner ID

diagnose_available_slots.description: Available diagnosis slots grouped by practitioner ID

post.summary: Create a new available slot for Practitioner
post.description: Endpoint to create a new available time slot for the authenticated practitioner.

message.example: La hora disponible de visita ha sido creada con éxito

error.example: La fecha y hora indicadas se solapan con una cita existente

delete.summary: Delete an available slot for Practitioner
delete.description: Endpoint to delete an available time slot for the authenticated practitioner.

message.example: La hora disponible de visita ha sido eliminada con éxito
La hora disponible de visita indicada no existe

get.summary: Get Available Slots for Treatment (60-minute appointments) for Practitioner
get.description: Retrieve available time slots for Treatment appointments for the authenticated practitioner.

200.description: Successful retrieval of available treatment slots

practitioners.description: List of practitioners with their IDs and names

treatment_available_slots.description: Available treatment slots grouped by practitioner ID

get.summary: Get Available Slots for Diagnosis (30-minute appointments) for Practitioner
get.description: Retrieve available time slots for Diagnosis appointments for the authenticated practitioner.

200.description: Successful retrieval of available diagnosis slots

practitioners.description: List of practitioners with their IDs and names

diagnose_available_slots.description: Available diagnosis slots grouped by practitioner ID

post.description: Endpoint to seed available time slots for the authenticated practitioner over a specified date range.

message.example: Las horas disponibles de visita han sido generadas con éxito

get.description: Retrieve a list of vacations for practitioners. Admins can see all practitioners' vacations, while practitioners can see only their own.

practitioners.description: List of practitioners with their IDs and names

put.summary: Update a vacation period for a practitioner
put.description: Update a vacation period for a practitioner.

message.example: El período de vacaciones se ha actualizado con éxito
Vacation not found
Failed to update vacation

post.summary: Create a new vacation period for a practitioner
post.description: Create a new vacation period for a practitioner.

message.example: El período de vacaciones se ha creado con éxito
Failed to create vacation

delete.summary: Delete a vacation period for a practitioner
delete.description: Delete a vacation period for a practitioner.

message.example: El período de vacaciones se ha eliminado con éxito

post.description: Endpoint to create a new user. Accessible only by superadmin role.

message.example: Usuario creado con éxito
